description:
Protect your pack and your puffy coat from the sharp points of your screws, crampons, and spare picks.

  • Made of vinyl-coated nylon
  • Four drain holes let water out
  • Velcro® and Fastex® buckles keep small parts in
  • An internal zippered pocket holds wrenches, screws, and bolts securely
  • Dimensions are 42 x 14.5 x 15.5cm. Capacity is 9.4L
name: Black Diamond Toolbox Crampon Bag
